      • getDate

        public static java.lang.String getDate()

      • convertFileSizeToString

        public static java.lang.String convertFileSizeToString​(double inputFileSize)
        this function will take in a filesize as a double of bytes the bytes will be converted into string of B/KiB/MiB/GiB etc... takes in a double of bytes, returns the size normalized as a string
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        file size in string format
